channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 30th November
item.description:
Next to the Innsworth Lane Sports Ground sign, Longlevens. Two bags, one containing general litter and the other cans/plastic bottles for recycling. Also one nitrous oxide cyclinder.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Non permitted road works at the junction of manor road and runnings road, 30th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
